snippet: Although we do perceive a slight advantage for President Obama in the Electoral College relative to the popular vote, a Florida poll released on Thursday is a helpful reminder of why it's not all that robust.
abstract: Although we do perceive a slight advantage for President Obama in the Electoral College relative to the popular vote, a Florida poll released on Thursday is a helpful reminder of why it's not all that robust.

headline.main: Oct. 11: Obama's Swing State 'Firewall' Has Brittle Foundation
